title: The Asset Allocator: At What Price Do You Get In?
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The implicit timeline for most stock-market trades and most stock-market analysis is short-term, yet most investors’ personal timelines are long-term. A lot of stock-market analysis will therefore fail to satisfy investors’ personal questions. This podcast (6:22) suggests investors not overthink things. Accumulators of capital should buy. The current market crisis may well be the event whose importance to our future wealth we did not fully appreciate as it occurred. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
